name: Snatch
description:
"Snatch" was designed as a part of the "Mini Jam 50: Islands" jam in less than 72 hours.

In our game you will find:
Only ONE level!
Only ONE bag of money!
Only ONE way to win!
A LOT of fun! (hopefully)

In "Snatch" you are carrying a stolen bag of money through a large number of police officers. Driven by their greed, random bystanders will help you in this difficult task - any of them will gladly take the money should you can toss it to them, drawing the cops' attention.
Remember, the police will open fire, so try to pass the bag to somebody else before they take you down!
You can take cover behind trash cans and a hot dog stans, but mind they can only take ONE bullet before they are destroyed.

Try to complete the game with a few casualties as possible.

____________________________________________________________________________________________

Music: Dank Memes" by Tim Beek (timbeek.com)
